key_risks: Environmental impact and regulatory compliance challenges, including energy consumption, waste generation, and PM2.5 emissions
Legal and financial risks from litigation related to defective roofing shingles and warranty claims
Operational and market risks due to global operations, geopolitical risks, and dependence on cyclical industries
controversies: Product defects and litigation involving Oakridge-brand fiberglass asphalt roofing shingles
Environmental concerns over manufacturing processes and reliance on non-renewable raw materials
environmental_issues: Scrutiny over energy consumption, waste generation, and PM2.5 emissions
Reliance on non-renewable raw materials like fiberglass and asphalt
social_issues: Potential reputational damage from product defects and litigation
Commitment to human rights and ethical practices, including prohibition of child labor and emphasis on health and safety
governance_issues: Management of legal liabilities and product quality issues
